Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Matt Kaplan
Reviews.Content: I've had this product for a little less than two years. When it turns on it works fine. The main problem I have is it doesn't always turn on. For the life of me, I don't know why I decided to go cheap with a lesser brand, but I am paying the price in frustration. A quick unplug would usually fix this problem but as of lately its not. Eventually, it does turn on but still I've never had any other TV or electronic do this before. Also, the speakers are god awful.
